person.persName: William Jefferson Pigg (Lawrence County, Kentucky, resident and farmer.)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer. Floyd County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Pigg and Sarah Ratcliffe Pigg. Married to Elizabeth Chapman Pigg in Lawrence County on February 3, 1853. Father of Peris T. Pigg, Daniel L. Pigg, Lindsey E. Pigg, Ezekiel S. Pigg, and Catherine Pigg. Resident of Lawrence County in 1850. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1860. Employed Harry Calloway as a farmhand in Lawrence County in 1860. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1863.
